headline: Northern Trust (NTRS): Margin Improvement Reinforces Quality Narrative Despite Slower Growth Than Market
summary: Northern Trust (NTRS) reported earnings forecasted to grow at 3.8% per year, while revenue is set to rise 3.7% annually. Both figures lag behind the broader US market’s 15.5% and 10% growth rates, respectively. Net profit margin ticked up to 21% from last year’s 20.8%. Although five-year earnings growth has averaged a healthy 7% annually, the latest year’s increase was a modest 2.3%. Despite strong earnings quality and an attractive Price-To-Earnings Ratio of 14.1x compared to industry peers,...
